examples.korean: He says the media are ravening wolves. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 언론을 먹이를 찾아 날뛰는 늑대들이라고 말한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He says the media are ravening wolves. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: wolves hunting in packs 듣기 Add to Wordbook 무리 지어 사냥하는 늑대들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: wolves hunting in packs Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Wolves get a bad rap, says a woman who owns three. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 늑대들은 부당한 평가를 받고 있다고, 늑대를 세 마리 키우는 한 여성은 말한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Wolves get a bad rap, says a woman who owns three. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The dog that kills wolves is killed by wolves. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 늑대 잡는 개는 늑대에게 죽는다. (스페인속담, 죽음속담) 명언/속담
examples.english: The dog that kills wolves is killed by wolves. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Beware of the wolf in sheep's clothing. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 양 가죽을 쓴 늑대를 조심하라. (서양속담, 지혜속담) 명언/속담
examples.english: Beware of the wolf in sheep's clothing. Add to Wordbook
